sen.j: 志筑忠雄（しつき ただお、宝暦10年（1760年） - 文化 (元号)3年7月3日 (旧暦)（1806年8月16日））は、江戸時代の蘭学者、長崎通詞。
sen.e: Tadao SHITSUKI (1760 - July 3, 1806) was a Dutch scholar and Dutch interpreter in Nagasaki in the Edo period.

sen.j: 中野家に生まれ、志筑家の養子となる。
sen.e: He was born as a son of the Nakano family and adopted by Shitsuki family.

sen.e: After he resigned as an interpreter, he called himself Ryuho NAKANO and pursued for Western studies and astronomy as well as nurturing apprentices.
